Bartel joined the Giants board in December 2018, a couple of years after finishing his 305-game, three-flag career at Kardinia Park.
Speaking on Fox Footys Trading Day, Herald Sun reporter Jon Ralph… [+2059 chars]

articles.title: Dees swap picks with Crows in bid to unlock Big Ben trade - AFL
articles.description: Melbourne moves up the order after pick swap with Adelaide
articles.content:
MELBOURNE has executed a pick swap with Adelaide which could help unlock a deal to land North Melbourne's Ben Brown.

articles.description: After being written off by all and sundry leading into game one, the Maroons now head to Sydney with the chance to wrap up the series following an upset.
articles.content:
After being written off by all and sundry going into game one, the Maroons head to Sydney with the chance to wrap up the Ampol State of Origin series.
